answer:
In BC, influenza vaccines are typically available starting in October/November. We don't currently have an established start date for all influenza vaccination clinics across BC, as it varies by location.  Find an Influenza (flu) clinic near you and contact them directly about vaccine availability.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## In BC, influenza vaccines are typically available starting in October/November.

We don't currently have an established start date for all influenza vaccination clinics across BC, as it varies by location.

## Find an Influenza (flu) clinic near you and contact them directly about vaccine availability.

Immunization Nurse
